src.description: The source URL of the image

alt.description: Alternative text for the image, used for accessibility and as fallback

width.description: The width of the image, either in pixels or as a percentage

height.description: The height of the image, either in pixels or as a percentage

loading.description: Indicates whether the image should load eagerly or lazily

fit.description: Specifies how the image should fit within its container

onClick.description: Callback function triggered when the image is clicked

caption.description: Optional caption text to display with the image
